simulationRun.authors: M Webb, J. Williams, T. Andrews, A. Bodas-Salcedo, Y Tsushima, J Hughes, C Jones

conformance.description: Main element (r1i1p1) is initialised on 1859-12-01. Remaining elements are initialised at monthly intervals through 1860.

requirementsReference.description: Reference to a NumericalRequirement called ic.006 in a experiment called 6.3 abrupt4xCO2
requirementsReference.name: ic.006

conformance.description: Starts at 1859-12-01 and runs for 150 years for first element [CFMIP variables only for 140 years). Remaining 11 elements for 5 years starting at different months in 1860.

requirementsReference.description: Reference to a NumericalRequirement called stc.037 in a experiment called 6.3 abrupt4xCO2
requirementsReference.name: stc.037

requirementsReference.description: Reference to a NumericalRequirement called bc.056 in a experiment called 6.3 abrupt4xCO2
requirementsReference.name: bc.056

deployment.description: The resources(deployment) on which this simulation ran

platformReference.description: Reference to a platform called IBM Power 6
platformReference.name: IBM Power 6

simulationRun.description: Imposes an instantaneous quadrupling of atmospheric CO2 concentration (relative to pre-industrial) and then holds it fixed for the rest of the simulation. Main run extends for 150 years from 1859-12-01. The remaining 11 members run for only 5 years at the start of the simulation - each is initialised from piControl at a different month in 1860 9e.g. r2i1p1 runs from 1860-01-01 to 1865-01-01, and is initialised from piControl 1860-01-01.

standard.description: The QN_DRS value allows mapping from data files to metadata being exported from the metadata questionnaire, and contains the insitution name, the model name on which the simulation was run, and the experiment name to which the simulation conforms. Additionally, for a non-ensemble run, a rip value will be included. The format of the string will thus be: institute_model_experiment.
standard.name: QN_DRS

dataSourceReference.description: Reference to a componentProperty called initial_land_use in a modelComponent called Land Surface
dataSourceReference.name: initial_land_use

input.description: The historical land use data is based on the HYDE database v3.1 (Klein Goldewijk et al., 2010a; Klein Goldewijk et al., 2010b) as processed for CMIP5 by Hurtt et al (2010), and made available at 0.5 x 0.5 degree resolution. These fractions are mapped on to the N96 grid using area average re-gridding.
